title: Certimate使用

---

# 部署
```shell

mkdir -p ~/.certimate && cd ~/.certimate && curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/usual2970/certimate/refs/heads/main/docker/docker-compose.yml && docker compose up -d
```


```shell
# 如果是非docker启动
./certimate serve
```

```shell
用户名：admin@certimate.fun
密码：1234567890
```

```shell
如何配置证书
```
